name: Regretting
description:
Regretting ...

in 2009 The Doctor Jhonas and His Wife Bought a House From an Old Woman 
In Their First days in The House It was Really Normal But after a Period The Couple Started Hearing Noise and Also They Saw Weird things happens 

After Few Days The Couple Died in a Weird Way 

Your Job is a Detective and You Will Go to the House and Explore it and Get answers About The Death of Them 

Dive into This Adventure and Know The truth About this HOUSE

The Game Have : 

• Realistic Movement  
 • Realistic Camera Movement 
• Interaction With Anything
• Save/Load System (Player Data, Scene Data, Inventory, Encryption)
• Pausing System 
• Psychological Horror
• Setting System ( You Can Customize The Settings and The Controls )
• Player Lean and Wall Detection  
• Item Switcher
• Cross-Platform Input (PC, PS4, XONE) • Advanced Menu System (Cross-Platform Support)
• Objectives System 
• Interact Manager 
• Examination System (Rotate, Double Examine, Papers)
• Light Items (Flashlight, Hinge Lantern, Candle) • Backpack Inventory Expand Pickup
•  (Keypad Lock, Keycard Lock, Padlock)
• Realistic VHS Player 
• Ambience Zones
• Water Buoyancy
• Interactive Lights (Lamps, Switchers, Animation) • Props, Collectable Items, much more..

System Requirements :

Recommended  Minimum  CPU :   2.8Ghz // Intel i5  GPU :  4 GB VRAM  RAM :  8 GB CPU :   2.3Ghz // Intel i3 GPU :  1 GB VRAM  RAM :  4 GB
